Name: Check In
Description: Indicates the patient has done the required paperwork and check-in to begin a visit to the clinic/hospital.

Name: Vitals
Description: For capturing vital signs

Name: Admission
Description: Indicates that the patient has been admitted for inpatient care, and is not expected to leave the hospital unless discharged.

Name: Discharge
Description: Indicates that a patient's inpatient care at the hospital is ending, and they are expected to leave soon.

Name: Visit Note
Description: Encounter where a full or abbreviated examination is done, usually leading to a presumptive or confirmed diagnosis, recorded by the examining clinician.

Name: Check Out
Description: The patient is explicitly leaving the hospital/clinic. (Usually no formal encounter is captured for this.)

Name: Intra-Hospital Transfer
Description: Indicates that a patient is being transferred into a different department within the hospital. (Transfers out of the hospital should not use this encounter type.)

Name: Attachment Upload
Description: Encounters used to record uploads of attachments.

Name: Lab Results
Description: Encounter for capturing lab results

Name: HTS Testing
Description: An encounter where provider conducts HIV test on patient

Name: HTS Linkage to Care and treatment
Description: An encounter where patient is linked to HIV Care & Treatment

Name: HTS Result Collection
Description: An encounter where patient collects test results

Name: HTS Retrospective
Description: This is a temporary one to get the work on the retrospective data entry form started

Name: Care and Treatment Service Enrolment
Description: An encounter where a client is enrolled for care and Treatment Services

Name: Clinical Visit
Description: Encounter type associated with a clinical visit

Name: COVID Case Report
Description: CARES COVID case report encounter type

Name: COVID Case Assessment
Description: This encounter type is shared across the COVID Assessment Form/COVID Outcome Form and COVID Lab Result Form

Name: COVID Vaccination
Description: This encounter type is used for COVID vaccination encounters to record vaccination administration

Name: HIV Lab Order and Results
Description: HIV Lab Order and Results

Name: COVID Lab Encounter
Description: Used for COVID Lab Order & Results encounters

Name: COVID Sample Collection
Description: This encounter type is used by forms used to collect a COVID sample
